title: How Brains Send a Signal That Itâ€™s Time to Vomit
description: In a study of mice, researchers worked out a neural pathway that could help researchers alleviate nausea symptoms from chemotherapy drugs.
dc:creator: Veronique Greenwood
media:description: New findings show that a bacterial toxin and a chemotherapy medication both set in motion a cascade of similar neural messages that cause queasiness.
